title: Technical Executive
description: Technical Executive at FED KIIT University Society. Contributed to front-end development projects, collaborated with a team to build innovative web solutions, and actively contributed to open-source projects.

title: Project Intern
description: Worked as a Project Intern at ISRO. Developed the website for International Yoga Day-25 , contributing to web development, ensuring smooth user experience for a wide audience and collaborating with the ISRO team.
